title: Bugs/Reading and Eating
marks: Signatures inside front cover, in black ink: [Checefsky / Pra
description: tan cover with worm-shaped opening on front cover and three rectangular openings on back cover; accordion-folded pages with photographic images of reversed negative-image text pages with white insect silhouettes on one side and ants and debris with \"READING & EATING\" written in honey on other side
creditline: Gift of Tina Cassara and Bruce Checefsky
